job.title: Senior Software Engineer (Cloud Management)
job.description: stronguCompany DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongOur MissionbrbrstrongAt Palo Alto Networks everything starts and ends with our missionbrbrBeing the cybersecurity partner of choice protecting our digital way of lifebrbrWe have the vision of a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before These arent easy goals to accomplish  but were not here for easy Were here for the better We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done and were looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we arebrbrWere changing the nature of work Palo Alto Networks is evolving to meet the needs of our employees now and in the future through FLEXWORK our approach to how we work From benefits to learning location to leadership weve rethought and recreated every aspect of the employee experience at Palo Alto Networks And because it FLEXes around each individual employee based on their individual choices employees are empowered to push boundaries and help us all evolve togetherbrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongYour CareerbrbrstrongSenior or Mid Level Software Engineer Cloud ManagementbrbrOur engineering team is at the core of our products  connected directly to the mission of preventing cyberattacks We are constantly innovating  challenging the way we and the industry think about cybersecurity Our engineers donapost shy away from building products to solve problems no one has pursued beforebrbrWe define the industry instead of waiting for directions We need individuals who feel comfortable in ambiguity excited by the prospect of a challenge and empowered by the unknown risks facing our everyday lives that are only enabled by a secure digital environmentbrbrstronguYour ImpactbrustrongulliDesign implement and deploy scalable and reliable data pipelines with high throughput and low latencyliliIncorporate feature engineering data pipelines and transforms to deliver data for ML machine learning model training and runtime inference servicesliliImprove ML scaling infrastructure for data ETL model training and lifecycle MLOps batch and runtime processing and inferenceliliCreatively analyze effectiveness of existing models to iterate and improveliliDeliver Executive dashboards end to end with actionable insightsliliBe both a deep technical leader and a handson engineerliliChampion engineering quality by building analytical tools to utilize the data pipeline providing actionable insight into key business performance metrics designing and implementing test plans and driving continuous operational excellencebrliulstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongstrongYour ExperiencebrstrongulliBSMS Degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline or related practical experienceliliStrong computer science fundamentals eg understanding of lockfree data structures bloom filters minimal flawless hashing consistent hashing etclili3 years experience or equivalent in software engineeringliliProfessional experience in software development using pythongolang java or other programming languagesliliGood understanding of distributed data processing pipeline designs  including ingestion ETL queriesliliExperience with SQLNoSQL database design including scalability performance and resilienceliliA focus on quality with experience writing unitcomponentsystem tests develop and implement test plansliliExperience with containerizing applications with Docker and Kubernetes liliKnowledge of CICD amp DevOps tools a plusliliKnowledge of GitHubGitlab a plusliliExperience on public clouds and products such as GCP a plusbrliulstronguAdditional InformationbrbrustrongstrongOur CommitmentbrbrstrongWere trailblazers that dream big take risks and challenge cybersecuritys status quo Its simple we cant accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating togetherbrbrWe are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need please contact us at accommodationspaloaltonetworkscombrbrPalo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer We celebrate diversity in our workplace and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age ancestry color family or medical care leave gender identity or expression genetic information marital status medical condition national origin physical or mental disability political affiliation protected veteran status race religion sex including pregnancy sexual orientation or other legally protected characteristicsAll your information will be kept confidential
